 2012-17512012-12-13TC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Air Transportation Regulations and the Canadian Transportation Agency Designated Provisions Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the AIR TRANSPORTATION REGULATIONS AND THE CANADIAN TRANSPORTATION AGENCY DESIGNATED PROVISIONS REGULATIONS in order to (1) enable consumers to readily determine the total price of an advertised air service; and (2) promote fair competition between all advertisers in the air travel industry.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0298 Publication Date: 2013-01-02
AttachmentsAttachment
